DataElement.preferredName: Equipment Reprocessor Manufacturer Geographic Location Address Postal Code Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Further or repeated use of equipment, instruments, devices, or materials. It includes additional use regardless of the original intent of the producer as to disposability or durability. It does not include the repeated use of fluids or solutions.A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods._A position, site, or point in space where something can be found._Of or relating to the science of geography; determined by geography.__The string of characters used to identify the five-digit Zone Improvement Plan (ZIP) code and the four-digit extension code (if available) that represents the geographic segment that is a subunit of the ZIPcode, assigned by the U.S. Postal Service to a geographic location to facilitate mail delivery; or the postal zone specific to the country, other than the U.S., where the mail is delivered.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Further or repeated use of equipment, instruments, devices, or materials. It includes additional use regardless of the original intent of the producer as to disposability or durability. It does not include the repeated use of fluids or solutions.A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods._A position, site, or point in space where something can be found._Of or relating to the science of geography; determined by geography._

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Further or repeated use of equipment, instruments, devices, or materials. It includes additional use regardless of the original intent of the producer as to disposability or durability. It does not include the repeated use of fluids or solutions.

Concepts.definition: Further or repeated use of equipment, instruments, devices, or materials. It includes additional use regardless of the original intent of the producer as to disposability or durability. It does not include the repeated use of fluids or solutions.

Property.preferredDefinition: A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods.:Of or relating to the science of geography; determined by geography.:A position, site, or point in space where something can be found.

Concepts.definition: A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods.
Of or relating to the science of geography; determined by geography.
A position, site, or point in space where something can be found.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: all components of an address, including building number, street name and type, city, state, postal code, and country.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The string of characters used to identify the five-digit Zone Improvement Plan (ZIP) code and the four-digit extension code (if available) that represents the geographic segment that is a subunit of the ZIPcode, assigned by the U.S. Postal Service to a geographic location to facilitate mail delivery; or the postal zone specific to the country, other than the U.S., where the mail is delivered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the outcome or resolution of the patient's adverse events.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The location at which an organization or person can be reached. (from American Heritage Dictionary):Any system designed to expedite the sorting and delivery of mail by assigning a series of alphanumeric codes to each delivery area.  Also used to refer to any individual delivery area code.:One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: A standardized representation of the location of a person, business, building, or organization.
Any system designed to expedite the sorting and delivery of mail by assigning a series of alphanumeric codes to each delivery area. Also used to refer to any individual delivery area code.
One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

DataElement.changeDescription: Released as part of the Draft New Cleanup_11.07.18
